title: Possessing Your Inheritance: Take Hold of God's Destiny for Your Life
features: Inheritance means taking hold of the portion God has planned for you. Jesus said, "I have come that they may have life, and that they may have it more abundantly" (John 10:10), demonstrating God's longing for His people to prosper, to accomplish all He has planned for them. He wants to take them from a place of judgment, desolation, and fruitlessness to a place of restoration, hope, and abundant life. In this revised and updated edition of
, prophetic intercessor Chuck Pierce, with coauthor Rebecca Wagner Sytsema, shows readers how to embrace what God has destined for them, for their children, and their children's children.
description: is president of Glory of Zion International Ministries, Kingdom Harvest Alliance, and Global Spheres, Inc. A bestselling author known for his accurate prophetic gifting, he and his wife, Pam, live in Corinth, Texas. Learn more at gloryofzion.org.
currently serves as director of Children of Destiny, and also works as a freelance author and editor. She is coauthor of
Protecting Your Home from Spiritual Darkness,
. Rebecca lives in Florida with her husband, Jack, and their three sons.
